overview: A trip to the VERY NAUGHTY RESORT explores the mind-body-spirit connection with erotic results. When Carrie goes to a resort, she thinks she's at a traditional spiritual revival until she meets Nikki, a very unusual preacher. The beautiful Nikki helps her get in touch with her soul in sensual ways that Carrie had never imagined.
tagline: Room Service Has A Whole New Meaning
title: The Very Naughty Resort
